titleStmt.title: The history of the Eucharist divided into three parts : the first treating of the form of celebration : the second of the doctrine : the third of worship in the sacrament / written originally in French by monsieur L'Arroque ... done into English by J.W.
Histoire de l'Eucharistie. English
titleStmt.author: Larroque, Matthieu de, 1619-1684.

notesStmt.note: Translation of author's Histoire de l'Eucharistie.
